newsitem.title: USA: Bergen Cty, N.J., plans development agency - paper.
newsitem.headline: Bergen Cty, N.J., plans development agency - paper.

text.p: Bergen County, N.J., plans to open a new economic development authority, Bergen Record reported Wednesday.
The not-for-profit agency would help companies interested in moving into Bergen County or considering relocating out of the area.

Few other details were immediately available about the scope of the new authority, but it would coordinate economic development programs with other existing government and private sector entities, the paper said.
The agency's initial budget would be $70,000.
